v.v: I trust that Yahweh will protect me.
It is true that wicked people have hidden in the darkness,
When wicked people do not suffer for disobeying the laws,
But Yahweh is sitting on his throne in his sacred temple in heaven,
Yahweh examines what righteous people do and what wicked people do,
He will send down from the sky flaming coals and burning sulfur on the wicked;
Yahweh does everything that is right, and he loves those who do what is right;

v: So I do not fly off to the mountains like birds do.
that they have pulled back their bowstrings and aimed their arrows
to shoot them at people who honor Yahweh.
and he sees everything that people do.
and he hates those who love to injure others.
he will send scorching hot winds to punish them.
such people will come into his presence.
